Elita:

"Prime is my dad's surname"said Elita"Due that I'm Elita prime, jus=
t like humans"

Elita knew about humans traditiond due her Dads stories whe=
n he was an autobot.







From: Sandy 
Sent: Sunday, March 28, 2010 10:00=
 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark/ Light our Dar=
kest Hour.


  
Tucson is slightly taken aback by the empowerment, as he st=
umbles slightly shaking his head with his optics closed for just a moment. =
He blinks, and slowly opens his eyes. Instead of darkness he could see blur=
ry shapes forming. They seem to focus. He looks down to Lord Elder and can =
finally see him and his comrades for the very first time since his unfortun=
ate accident that left him blind in the beginning. His silver armor shimmer=
ing more than usual, and his mass doubled in size, and physical strength. H=
e smiles to Lord Elder, now realizing what has just happened.

" It's good =
to actually see my comrades instead of just listening to them. Lord Elder, =
I wish to thank you for your support in getting me this far. If it had not =
been for you, I would not have made it back to the Ark to fullfill this que=
st. And of course Rat Trap, he rescued me and if he had not, it wouldn't ha=
ve been possible. I promise you your debts will be receprocated tenfold."

=
He looks to Kup, and Elita seeing their faces for the first time in years. =
He was most joyed to see them again, more than anything else. His vision cl=
ears more and more and soon the images of his comrades becomes clear. He sa=
lutes them both.

"Kup, Elita, as Autobots I honor you for the courage you'=
ve shown me this day. I will need your courage now my friends. As we all kn=
ow, Hydras, Cyclonus and Scourge are on a power trip bent on Greed and tyra=
nical dictatorship. They wish to gorge themselves on power, rather than res=
olve the matter of Unicron. They wish to also over power him, and gain the =
power for themselves. If they do that, we have more than just a simple disa=
ster on our hands. That has to be stopped. Also, we need to get back Rodimu=
s, Nightlight and Windlord as soon as possible. Their sparks are being used=
 injustly and I will not tolerate it any further. Also, when we do manage t=
o rescue Rodimus and the others, I had once thought I'd be resentful toward=
 him for allowing himself to fall to such means.. I was wrong to be as such=
. And I'd rather not see any of us make the same mistake. Please, we must b=
e understanding to Rodimus, for none of this was his fault."

He looks to t=
he computer for any signs from Night Shift. Then he looks back to the room =
filled with disabled Autobots and Decepticons. 

" Optimus Prime gave me hi=
s power for a reason, not only to defeat the evil that infects this land, b=
ut to also show compassion to those who were cast asside. These Decepticons=
 who lie dorment with the Autobots, I know we're enemies, but their leader =
did not lead them with encouragement, he lead them with corruption. And if =
they failed, he'd treat them like junk. They did what they had to do becaus=
e they were forced, not because they wanted to. We also fight for their fre=
edom as well as our own. If only they could awaken, and if only I could tel=
l them that they have the choice to freely chose which faction they wish to=
 return to."

He turns back to his comrades.

"Night Shift should be almost=
 at the Dark Fortress, hopefully he will send us the information we need to=
 reverse the shell program which infects Rodimus and possibly Nightlight an=
d Windlord. It may take him some time to get it to us, but be prepared, it =
could happen sooner than later."

He then transmits to Legacy.

" Legacy, i=
f you get this transmission, this is Tucson Prime, transmitting to you from=
 the Ark. Inform the Maximals of my status, and tell them hope will come so=
on enough. Tucson Prime, out." 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Car=
roll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> > He gets up onto his feet.
> >
> > " M=
y roots have traced me back to Optimus Prime, who was not only a much admir=
ed leader, but also a beloved relative. And as a relative of Optimus Prime,=
 I too, am ready to embrace the vows he once took upon recieving the Matrix=
 of Leadership. I'm ready Matrix, I'M READY TO LIGHT OUR DARKEST HOUR!"
> 
=
> Even as Tuscon finished speaking the door from the interior of the Ark
> =
opened as Lord Elder came through.
> 
> At the same time a voice could clea=
rly be heard speaking to Tuscon,
> "Boldness may be needed."
> 
> Another v=
oice spoke, "A darkness is coming, when the light of all of
> us maybe need=
ed."
> 
> As the voices spoke, there was a click, then a rumble as Optimus
=
> Prime's chest plate split down the middle and then slowly opened. From
> =
inside a light blazed out, and the sphere that was the matrix rose up
> in =
a sea of blue white light that spread out and filled the entire
> chamber, =
lighting the room like a miniature star.
> 
> "Arise, Tuscon!" came another=
 voice, this one sounding much like Optimus Prime.
> 
> The matrix position=
ed itself above the fallen leader of the Autobots
> as if observing the roo=
m for a moment. Then it oriented on Tuscon.
> 
> "We cannot give you the ma=
trix itself, but the power that we have we
> bequeath to you."
> 
> From th=
e center of the Matrix a beam of pure energy lanced out and
> struck Tuscon=
, bathing him in a nimbus of coruscating light and power,
> changing him, e=
nhancing him, filling him with the energy and wisdom
> that was the Autobot=
s.
> 
> "We have given you the embers Tuscon, and its power has changed you=
.
> However to light our darkest hour you must ignite the flames of that
> =
which have gone out."
> 
> With those words the ball dimmed as it slowly dr=
opped into Optimus
> Prime's chest. With a click the matrix settled back in=
to place as
> Optimus' chest cavity and slowly the plates slid shut, and th=
e room
> returned to its dark hue.
> 
> 
> OOC: Tuscon Prime has arrived!!!=
!!!
> 
> Preston
>
